TenantSecurityAIGtwyUsage.name: TenantSecurityAIGtwyUsage
TenantSecurityAIGtwyUsage.description: Stores Einstein generative AI gateway usage data.

DetailIdentifier.description: The ID of the individual detail record. This field is unique across all tenants.

Feature.description: The AI feature for which the gateway request was made.

MaskedResponse.description: The generated response from the LLM. If masking is enabled, this may contain placeholder text.

MetricIdentifier.description: The ID of the type of metric that was counted. This field is unique within your organization.

Model.description: The name of the model to which the request was sent.

Name.description: The name of the metric for which data is being collected.

ObjectName.description: Name of the Salesforce object is referenced in the prompt.

Prompt.description: The hydrated version of prompt text before data masking is applied. The actual prompt sent to the LLM will mask sensitive data if data masking is enabled.

PromptTemplateDevName.description: The ID of the prompt template.

PromptTemplateVersionNo.description: The version of the prompt template.

PromptTokens.description: The number of tokens used in the prompt.

Tenant.description: The ID of the tenant of this AI gateway usage event.

TenantName.description: The name of the tenant of this AI gateway usage event.

TenantSecurityAIGtwyUsage.accessRules: This object is available for Security Center subscribers. This object is read-only.
